publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 76
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa čozmaḥlar byla miźmor Asafḥa da šira. Biĺuv́ĺud́ur Juhudada Teńri Jiš́- raʾeĺd́a ullu šemi anyn.
Da edi Jerušalajimd́a alačyɣy da toḥtar ornu Cijjonda.

Anda syndyrdy oḥlaryn jajnyn qalqanny da qylyčny
da č́erivni hamḿeš́a.
Balquvludur śeń H ḱuč́ĺu Teńri tavlaryndan jyrtuvnun.
Tilirdiĺar ḱuč́ĺu juŕakliĺar b́uŕaĺdiĺar jukulary da tapmadylar bar tuvušlu eĺ orunlaryn.
Ačuvujdan śeniń Teńrisi Jaʿaqovnun čyrym et́adir markav da at.
Śeń qorḥunčlu- sun da kim turalyr alnyjda ačuv vaḥtyjda.
Ḱokĺard́ań ešit́- tirdij t́oŕani jer qorḥtu da toḥtady.
Turɣanda Teńri t́oŕaǵa qutḥarma bar juvašlaryn jerniń hamḿeš́a.
Ki ačuv ḱorǵań adam š́uḱur et́ar saja qaldyɣyna dušmannyn ačuv byla bajlanɣyn.
Nijet́ et́arĺar da t́oĺarĺar H-ɣa Teńrijiźǵa bar č́uv́ŕalarińd́a keĺtirirĺar tirki qorḥunčlu Teńriǵa.
T́uǵatir bijni da aɣalyḥlarny qorḥunčlu bolur bijĺarińa jerniń.
